root: ^Hey there Hanae. So you're about to leave town right?
^That's right! I think I've done all I can to help this village for now.
^I can tell. The grass looks greener than before, not to mention all the flowers growing about.
^By the way, did you finally let Kat know what you think of her?
^Oh, well, um you see, when you left and I tried to convey my feelings to her...
^The flowers got blown away in the wind and floated down the lake.
^It was super embarrassing. I-I didn't know what to do afterwards, especially after all of your hardwork was down the drain. I'm so sorry!
^Still, I think when she saw the flowers, she asked me to meet her at small hilltop near the village. I-I don't know what it could be mean, but I will ask her out again for sure next time.
^I'm sure your feelings got across to her when she saw the flowers.
^Still, it's unfortunate that it got washed away into the lake.
^I hope everything works out between you two.
^Thanks Hanae, I won't forgot all  you've done for us.
